title: Calling an Oracle Function with PL/SQL BOOLEAN Type from SQL
description: One of the most wanted features in the Oracle database is the BOOLEAN type. The SQL standard specified it a while ago, and RDBMS like PostgreSQL show how powerful it can be, e.g. when using the EVERY() aggregate function.
